website_summaries.verdict: Sperry updated its iconic 1935 slip-on shoe to suit today’s modern demand for footwear. The classic model is made even more comfortable with upgraded materials including premium canvas upper, full-length cushioned insoles, and abrasion-resistant linings while retaining its toned-down yet versatile aesthetics.Not only is the Sperry Captain’s Slip On comfortable and lightweight, but it is also affordable which is an advantage. However, for most, the fit is narrow and tight which could sometimes cause a bit of discomfort.
pros: An assortment of colorways is available for the Sperry Captain’s Slip On shoe
These low-top sneakers from Sperry are easy on the budget as they come with an affordable price tag
The majority of reviewers commented that this shoe is extremely comfortable
The shoe is lightweight, as reported by some reviewers
Many purchasers were happy with the overall performance of this Sperry shoe
Several reviewers liked the versatility of this shoe concerning styling
cons: One reviewer reported that the Sperry Captain’s Slip On felt flimsy
Several wearers complained that this slip-on fits too tight especially on the top of the foot

customer_reviews.title: My favorite deck shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and comfortable (I don't require arch support which is non-existent in most deck shoes). I'm quite bummed that the white have become stoopidly (misspelled for emphasis) expensive - I can't personally justify the current price (as of this review - hopefully they'll get reasonable again) so I can purchase another pair
customer_reviews.author: Chris Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Like the shoes but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11 1/2 - 12 depending on the particular brand. After see reviews indicating they run a little small, I ordered 12's. I could barely get them on. Ended up exchanging them for 13's. No problem with the return.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good-not exactly a perfect slip on like my Sandals and not as comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good-not exactly a perfect slip on like my Sandals and not as comfortable as any of my Nike Sneakers but I wanted something easy to put on because of my bad Hips-I can slide foot in but still have to pull up heel-not ideal but functional!!

customer_reviews.title: With high arch  hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: Have a high arch and need orthotics. The shoes are thus very hard to get into but fine thereafter

customer_reviews.title: Not the shoe from picture
customer_reviews.text: When ordering these shoes, The photo seemed to show a Leather Sperry shoe with small holes. That is the shoe I wanted. The shoe I received was a black canvas shoe. This is not the shoe I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Better than prison shoes
customer_reviews.text: Much like prison shoes but higher quality. The footbed is surprisingly well structured and the no slip grip is the thing for those uppity yacht club weekends

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shoe thinking it would be very comfortable to wear on the yacht. NOPE! The size indicated is about 1 size less than what it actually is. It will stretch, but not much.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with Sperry!

customer_reviews.title: Order larger size

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Looks can deceiving!

customer_reviews.title: this shoe is excatly true to fit
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is comfortable and just right for those times you need to slip into a shoe without socks. Only negative was that there was not a larger choice of colors.

customer_reviews.title: Too Small/Tight

product_meta.title: Sperry Mens - Captain's Slip on
product_meta.description: Men's Sperry, Captain Slip on Shoes The iconic Sperry slip on gets update with plenty of comfort Seamless fabric uppers eliminates abrasion with logo accents Slip on style with dual elastic goring panels for an easy on and off Extra heel padding for added comfort Soft fabric linings Contoured cushioned footbed is contoured for added comfort Manmade outsole with molded Wave Siping for added traction
feature_bullets: Original 1935 Design updated with modern comfort
Ultra lightweight, flexible outsole with molded wave-siped traction
Abrasion-Resistant soft lining, allows for less break-in time
